channel.title: Black screen when players login
channel.description:
Hi, in my server theres a problem.
i realized that people are having a problems in my server.
after a while, they cannot login...it logs in but theres a black screen and it says loading-please wait
this problem only gets fixed when i edit in their character file...i have to change where they are located in..so they can login
is there any other way i can fix this problem?

item.title: Black screen when players login
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

change the starting spot?

Read full topic
